name: nearsightedness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the condition of only being able to see clearly objects that are close to you: I wear glasses for nearsightedness, but now can't read small print. Extreme nearsightedness can be corrected about half the time. She had mild to moderate near-sightedness. Synonym
myopiaOpposite
